conversations.description: A corporate lawyer asks LexiResearch to locate recent California appellate decisions on fiduciary duty breaches in shareholder derivative suits.
An employment attorney needs a memo summarizing EEOC guidance on remote‑work harassment claims and wants citation‑ready case law.
A patent counsel requests the latest USPTO rulings interpreting the Alice test for abstract ideas in software patents.
A family law practitioner looks for state statutes and recent cases on virtual visitation rights during post‑divorce custody disputes.
A healthcare compliance officer seeks federal regulations and key cases concerning HIPAA breach notification timelines.
A securities lawyer asks for summaries of SEC enforcement actions involving cryptocurrency token offerings and relevant case holdings.
An immigration attorney needs case law on asylum eligibility for climate‑change refugees from Central America.
A real‑estate developer requests statutory provisions and case precedents on easement termination in Texas.
A labor union representative looks for Supreme Court opinions on collective bargaining rights for gig‑economy workers.
A civil rights lawyer asks for recent Ninth Circuit rulings on voter‑ID laws and their constitutional analysis.
A bankruptcy attorney wants a concise overview of recent rulings on debtor‑in‑possession financing in Chapter 11 cases.
A municipal attorney searches for state statutes and case law on police use‑of‑force policies and qualified immunity.
A technology startup founder seeks guidance on open‑source license compliance, with citations to recent district court decisions.
An environmental lawyer needs a memo on EPA rule‑making authority for greenhouse‑gas emissions standards.
A consumer protection lawyer requests a summary of FTC enforcement actions against deceptive AI advertising.
A class‑action lead counsel asks for recent appellate decisions on settlement approval standards under Rule 23.
A nonprofit executive director needs to understand IRS regulations on charitable gaming activities in New York.
A corporate compliance officer wants a briefing on the new EU AI Act and its extraterritorial impact on US firms.
A defense attorney searches for precedent on the admissibility of digital forensic evidence from smartphones.
A tax attorney asks for recent Treasury Regulations interpreting Section 199A qualified business income deductions.
A transportation lawyer needs statutes and case law on liability for autonomous vehicle crashes in Illinois.
A entertainment lawyer requests case summaries on copyright protection for AI‑generated music works.
A construction firm counsel asks for recent decisions on mechanics' lien priority in Florida.
A pharmaceutical company legal team seeks FDA guidance and case law on off‑label drug marketing restrictions.
A data privacy officer needs a memo on California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) amendments and related case outcomes.
A divorce attorney asks for recent state statutes and case law on division of cryptocurrency assets.
A venture capital lawyer wants a briefing on recent Delaware Court of Chancery rulings about fiduciary duties of board members.
A municipal planner asks for local zoning ordinances and case law on accessory dwelling unit approvals.
An education attorney requests recent Supreme Court opinions on student free‑speech rights on social media platforms.
A landlord‑tenant lawyer searches for case law on habitability claims involving mold contamination in Washington state.
A civil litigation attorney needs a concise summary of recent rulings on attorney‑work product privilege in electronic communications.
A securities compliance officer looks for SEC guidance and case law on ESG (environmental, social, governance) disclosures.
A family law attorney asks for recent statutes and cases on same‑sex parent adoption in Massachusetts.
A product liability counsel seeks recent appellate decisions on defect standards for AI‑enabled medical devices.
A non‑profit lawyer requests a bibliography of case law interpreting the Uniform Charitable Trust Act.
A bankruptcy trustee needs a summary of recent case law on clawback of preferential transfers in Chapter 7.
A trademark attorney asks for recent TTAB decisions on the registrability of AI‑generated logos.
An antitrust lawyer looks for recent district court rulings on vertical price‑fixing in the e‑commerce sector.
A public‑interest lawyer requests a memo on recent First Amendment cases involving government‑mandated vaccine certification.
A corporate M&A team asks for a briefing on recent case law regarding implied covenants of good faith in merger agreements.
A government attorney needs analysis of recent Federal Circuit decisions on patent eligibility of biotech inventions.
A cyber‑security consultant asks for statutory penalties and case law on ransomware extortion under the Computer Fraud and Abuse Act.
A sports law attorney seeks recent cases on athlete name, image, and likeness (NIL) agreements and related contract enforceability.
A probate lawyer requests recent state statutes and case law on digital asset succession and estate planning.
A insurance defense counsel asks for recent appellate rulings on bad‑faith claims under state insurance codes.
A labor attorney wants a summary of recent decisions on employee classification under the ABC test in New York.
A municipal attorney seeks case law on the legality of curbside parking fees under state statutes.
A health law scholar requests a memo summarizing recent Ninth Circuit opinions on telemedicine reimbursement.
A technology procurement officer asks for recent case law on government contract disputes over AI software licensing.
A real‑estate lawyer needs a briefing on recent judgments about landlord liability for lead‑based paint disclosures.
A corporate ethics officer looks for recent SEC enforcement cases concerning insider trading using AI‑generated tips.
A civil rights advocate requests a summary of recent state supreme court decisions on voting‑rights restoration for ex‑felons.
